Outside of the R code chunks, the line widths get formatted correctly, so longer comments should go here. Inside, the R code chunks, numbers get formatted well enough but longer text doesn't automatically. 


```{r}
usual_txt <- "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec a sem venenatis, consequat purus ac, ullamcorper lacus. Duis semper porttitor lacus nec sollicitudin. Sed id cursus enim. Ut ut placerat justo, id blandit eros. Mauris condimentum id eros a fringilla. Nunc at euismod justo. Suspendisse facilisis diam nisl, quis mollis leo porttitor sed. Vestibulum ut ligula eget arcu consequat commodo scelerisque eu justo. Integer congue turpis et nulla suscipit semper. Aenean sodales, magna in vulputate sagittis, nibh enim interdum lacus, eget pharetra dui nisl et lectus. Nunc vel nunc dictum, aliquet massa sit amet, sodales diam. Sed viverra aliquet facilisis." 
# http://www.lipsum.com/
print(usual_txt)

print_fixed <- function(txt, fixed_width = 65){ 
  char.chunks <- unlist(strsplit(txt, split = " "))         # define this function once toward
  char.sum <- 0                                             # top of .Rmd, in R code chunk 
  i <- start <- 1                                           # presumably with echo = FALSE
  while(char.sum < fixed_width & i < length(char.chunks)){
    if(nchar(char.chunks[i]) + char.sum < fixed_width){
      char.sum <- char.sum + nchar(char.chunks[i])
    i <- i + 1
    }else{
      print(paste(char.chunks[start:i], collapse=" "))
      start <- i + 1
      i <- i + 1
      char.sum <- 0
    }
  }
}

print_fixed(usual_txt)
```
